name: Midnight Thunder Drive
description:
Immerse yourself in the neon-drenched streets, where high-speed thrills and pulse-pounding action await. Master the art of turbo-charged racing, navigate a neon-fueled world, and chase the victory with an electrifying synthwave soundtrack and addictive gameplay.Your desire is to push the limits of velocity gripping the steering wheel with a determined passion, your eyes fixed on the horizon as you prepare to conquer the road ahead and reach the end of the path as quickly as possible.

But this is no ordinary race. This is an exhilarating experience where strategy meets precision. It's not just about raw speed; it's about mastering the art of control and finesse. Your secret weapon lies in the turbocharger, eagerly charged with each expertly executed drift around the treacherous corners that lie in wait.
It's a game of balance, knowing when to push the pedal to the metal and when to gracefully dance with the curves of the track. The turbocharger is your ally, rewarding your deft maneuvers with an explosive burst of acceleration, propelling you to unimaginable speeds.More than 25 tracks and 5 maps based on retrowave themes and the futuristic vision of the 80's, will take you from the pulsating streets of vibrant cities and highways surrounded by palm trees at sunset to the highways that defy gravity in the vastness of space.By completing challenges, you will earn money and points that unlock customization parts and upgrades for your vehiclesPrepare to go head-to-head against formidable racers at breakneck speeds, utilizing your unrivaled skills in drift and turbo. Claim victory, and in return, you'll be rewarded with the ultimate prize: the boss vehicle!More than 25 synthwave tracks, including contributions from amazing artists like Russell Nash Music and RANsynth. All of this will allow each map to have unique soundtrack that matches the scenery's visuals.Each track and game mode will have an online leaderboard, featuring worldwide rankings and rankings among your friends.

FEATURES

  • Over 15 vehicles
  • Customize and upgrade your vehicles
  • More than 25 tracks and 5 maps
  • Boss racing challenges
  • Over 25 different synthwave songs
  • Different game modes
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Achievements
